item.title: AWS Route53
item.description: DNS works on port 53, hence the name route 53 In a VPC, AWS reserves the network range +2 address for DNS server. What are R53 resolvers? Inbound endpoint For queries from on-prem systems to resolve AWS hosted domains. Outbound endpoint For queries from AWS workloads for on-prem systems. You can specify rule for directing queries from inbound/outbound EP. Limit - 10,000 queries per second per IP Address for an EP.
